nodes.text: Dreviad Outpost was a settlement on the planet Tatooine during the Cold War. It was located close to The Wound.
A Nikto named Tookreek owned a cantina in the outpost.

Dreviad Outpost was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears as one of the Republic settlements on the planet Tatooine.
